name: Sumikko Gurashi: Sumikko Water
summary:
Get Sumikko in the water! Let's play by switching between two modes, land mode and water mode. You can even use water to take care of them! Get to know Sumikko by taking care of him and playing mini-games.

When you turn the device upside down, you can see the "water" in the screen! Water" will come out in the screen! Switch between land mode and water mode.
